title: Towards Baruya manhood. Part 2. Village life II
creator_credit: Ian Dunlop, John Martin-Jones and Film Australia
brief_description: Village life of the Baruya tribe in the Eastern Highlands of New Guinea. Includes work on a new garden, making a scarecrow, a cassowary hunters’ dance, part of a healing ceremony, and women feeding their pigs.
